entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
